ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: IHey there! You know what, I think I saw you today (Queenscorpio) in PoK just before I logged off for the day. LOL I do like the play on the astral signs,
ygData.messageBody:
IHey there!
You know what, I think I saw you today (Queenscorpio) in PoK just
before I logged off for the day. LOL I do like the play on the astral
signs, thats pretty cool.

Hey, I'm going to try and organize a small thing for this weekend
involving Nagafeen's Lair. Four of our Rangers (One is a little young
yet) need an item (a burnt sash) from there to get one of their lvl 50
spells. It's not of a "raid" status but I tried it yesterday with a good
friend from Jaggedpine Defenders and we were just getting smoked in
there. What sucked most of all was that everything was light blue and
green at the beginning but they hit hard and fast and they respawned
fast too. So we just decided to get a group together hopefully this
weekend and try it. He had a monk as well and was there trying to get a
piece for his epic but we didn't have much luck.

So if you would like to join us this next weekend and maybe pick up
your item as well for your monk (If you don't already have it) you are
more than welcome to join us. It's still in the "seeing who all is
available" stage so I can't guarantee it will happen. If we can get
everyone there it looks like we will have the following 3 Rangers (2 for
sure), 2 Monks (including you if you want to join) and either a cleric
or mage.

Let me know if you would like to join in.

Blessed be!
Durgaa
Guild Leader of Mystic Crusaders
